bibl.title: The Official Archive of the Village Scribes of Kerkeosiris. Notes on the so-called Archive of Menches.
bibl.note: "It has been my main purpose to point out some less known aspects of this fascinating Archive. First of all the remaining texts have to be published."

bibl.title: Festschrift zum 100-jährigen Bestehen der Papyrussammlung der Österreichischen Nationalbibliothek Papyrus Erzherzog Rainer (P. Rainer Cent.)

bibl.seg: Pestman Pieter Willem, The Official Archive of the Village Scribes of Kerkeosiris. Notes on the so-called Archive of Menches.
Festschrift zum 100-jährigen Bestehen der Papyrussammlung der Österreichischen Nationalbibliothek Papyrus Erzherzog Rainer (P. Rainer Cent.) (Wien, 1983) pp. 127-134.
"It has been my main purpose to point out some less known aspects of this fascinating Archive. First of all the remaining texts have to be published."
